title: The UK’s Coronavirus Labs Are Waiting For More Samples While NHS Workers Say They Can't Get Tested
description: Lab workers, NHS frontline staff and business leaders told BuzzFeed News how the government's troubled testing strategy was still misfiring on multiple fronts.View Entire Post ›
content:
There has also been a fundamental problem with the criteria for tests: many NHS workers on the frontline are distressed that they have so far been unable to get one because they are not showing symptoms.
